utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This door won’t open.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, mine won’t either. I think the crash bent the frame.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We need something to break the glass.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: My gun.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle … I can’t – I can’t find it. I think it got knocked out when we got hit. Help me look for it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m stuck.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What do you mean you’re stuck?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I mean my belt is jammed and the seat won’t move.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, what about a knife? Do you have a knife?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. In the trunk.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, look. We’re running out of time. I need you to see if you can find that gun and we’ll just shoot the belt off.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I can’t feel it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hang on, hang on.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: ‘kay.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Stay here.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I found it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I guess the good thing about having your daughter at crime scenes is that she can bring you dry clothes.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thanks. And um… thanks.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You’d’ve done the same for me.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. Probably.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m just glad you found my gun.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That whole, uh, sinking car thing? Much cooler in movies than in real life.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And for the record, I prefer watching spy thrillers to being in them.

utterance.speaker: JAVIER ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So. Tell me. How can your victim look like Nelson Blakely when he supposedly died 10 years ago?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah – I –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Weird, isn’t it?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah. Weird. Fake deaths, car in the water. Don’t you think now’s a good time to tell us what the hell is going on?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Uhh…

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m sorry, Javi. It’s classified.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I was Special Forces. I used to eat classified for breakfast and yet writer boy can know? Okay, I’ll be over there. With Harbor Patrol, trying to figure out how to get your unit out of the drink. I’m glad you’re okay.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Mmhmm.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Writer boy? So you think our shooter was Gage?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. I think he’s getting rid of anyone who could expose his rogue operations.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well he’s doing a pretty good job. We still have no idea what Pandora is.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, we know that Blakely was afraid, and we know that he was working on something that was big enough to threaten the future of this country.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We just don’t know what the hell he was working on.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There’s gotta be a clue somewhere in his life. Maybe there’s something on the body that will tell us.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS CASTLE
utterance.content: No, we checked. There was nothing in his pockets.

utterance.speaker: LANIE PARISH
utterance.content: But the way they were turned up makes me think that someone went through and emptied them.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Gage.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Ryan, get some teams to search the building.

utterance.speaker: KEVIN RYAN
utterance.content: What are we looking for?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t know, but he brought us here for a reason. Lanie, see what you can find on him. Dental scars, prints, tattoos – anything that might tell us –

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA TURNER
utterance.content: He’s dead.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, look. I can explain.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Get in the car.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: What the hell did you think you were doing?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What you wanted. Finding Blakely.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You cracked his code and you didn’t even think to notify me?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Look, in Castle’s defense, it was a longshot and he didn’t want to waste your time if he was wrong, and we were bringing the guy in when –

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: When he was killed! In your custody.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: What were you doing at the docks?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He asked us to take him there.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We don’t know.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Well, did you learn anything?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes. He was hired to analyze the United States for vulnerabilities. He said he found a weakness in our economy, an unexpected linchpin that if someone went after it would start the dominoes falling.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Falling toward what?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The end of our country as we know it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So what’s our next move?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: There is no next move. Not for you two. It was a mistake bringing you into the loop. You know, I really thought … I really thought that you had changed. But you know what? You are the same reckless, immature, self-centered jackass that you always were, and you’ve put this investigation at risk.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Look, I’m sorry –

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You’re sorry? We are on the next 9/11 or worse. This isn’t one of your damn books, Rick. This is real life and when things go bad you just can’t rewrite the ending like you did with us.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Get them both out of here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So … you slept with her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah… yeah. Yeah, I slept with her.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Have there been others?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Women?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Muses.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. … why?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I just wanted to see how big the club was, that’s all. Hey guys, what do you got?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, whoa whoa whoa. First off, there is no club. And second, we’re off the case, if you recall.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’re off their case. I still have a murder to solve.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where your chief suspect is smack dab in the middle of a CIA operation.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t care what he’s in the middle of! Thomas Gage killed three people, one of them was in my custody, he locked us in a trunk and then he sent my cruiser to the bottom of the Hudson.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Gage is a trained covert operative. There’s no way you can catch him.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes, I can. If I figure out where he was going. We find out what Blakely was working on, we find the linchpin. We find the linchpin, we find Gage.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Anything on the warehouse?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah. Right after you guys left the Feds showed up and shut us down.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: But we did find something on your vic. Nelson Blakely? His prints came back as a Scott McGreggor from Long Island City.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Problem is, McGreggor only seems to exist on paper. We can’t find any trace of him in the real world.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did you guys send units to the listed address?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, and the family living there had never heard of him. No one recognized his photo.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, someone must have known him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Someone did. He plays chess. That’s not a solo sport.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I thought you were off the case?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well … you heard what Sophia said. I’m a reckless, immature, self-centered jackass. If you’re stubborn enough to keep going, I’m stupid enough to go with you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: All right, you guys canvass all the chess parks in the city. Let’s see if we can dig up some of his opponents.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Beckett. What? What do you mean the body never arrived?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: They intercepted it in transport. Apparently they had a court order.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s impossible. How could they get a court order that fast?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t know, maybe you should ask your girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Girlfriend?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes, okay? We slept together. It was a long time ago. What’s the big deal?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There is no big deal. Sleep with whoever you want. The more the merrier.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: I have those, uh … toxicology reports you wanted?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Yes, just set them there, sweetie. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So, enjoying your new internship?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Well, I’m learning a lot.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Too much, I think.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: And I thought the dead bodies were going to be the grossest part.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Funny. Good night.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: So, who’s Beckett talking about?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: None of your business. Now go to bed.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: The woman at the docks. Who is she?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Nobody. Now go to bed.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: I saw the way you looked at her. She’s not nobody.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, it doesn’t matter who she is because I’m never going to see her again. Now go to bed.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: You know, if you’re going to keep secrets from me, I might start keeping secrets from you, too.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: At your age I’m thinking that might be a good idea.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Sophia.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Hello Rick.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How – what’re you – how did – how did you get in here?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: I’m CIA.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: So they’re turning them into graphic novels now?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, um… first one did well so they’re gonna do another.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: So what do you think? She look like me?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Wha- uh… what’re you doing here?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You’re going after Gage, aren’t you?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, we’re off the case, remember?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Mmm… you used to be a better liar. I know you’ve been looking into Blakely’s aliases.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: It’s okay, Rick. I don’t mind. In fact, I want you on this case.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: But –

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: I know what I said. But I also know what’s at stake. Bringing you and Beckett on board was not a popular decision and after what happened with Blakely I had to make a stand. But I know what kind of asset you can be. I know you’ll just keep digging no matter what I say. It’s your nature. You need to know how the story ends. Like with her.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Does she know about this?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well – that’s –

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You always did like playing with dynamite. Just be careful it doesn’t blow up in your face.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’s different.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Is she? Or do you just think she is?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: I heard you hit the same dead end with Blakely as we did. I thought you might be able to try this. It’s what Blakely was looking for at the pier. We found it in a go bag with plane tickets, cash, and some fake IDs.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Account numbers.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: All from domestic banks and since Blakely was a US citizen –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You’re prohibited from looking into them.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: But you guys aren’t. And those accounts may contain clues as to who hired him. And assuming you still want to know how the story ends…

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Just keep me in the loop this time. And Rick? Try not to get killed. I’m still quite fond of you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where are the boys?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: They’re canvassing chess parks looking for anyone that knew Blakely.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And … why aren’t you with them?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Because my car is at the bottom of the Hudson and Gates won’t issue me another one until I write up an incident report, which I can’t do because this case is classified.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Nothing. It’s just that that’s a perfect example of a linchpin. This case might go unsolved all because you don’t have access to a car.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Don’t make me shoot you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well if you shoot me who’s going to help you follow this lead? Blakely’s bank account information. It’s what he was going for on the pier. If we can track his money –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where did you get that?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Sophia. She came to my place last night. Not like that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, of course. So then what happened to reckless, immature, self-centered jackass?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’s posturing for her colleagues.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mmhmm.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Beckett, it’s a lead. She wants us on the case.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What do you think this is about, huh?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Smells like an intelligence op.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: CIA? NSA? DHS?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Same letters, different alphabet. I had some buddies from the service volunteer for intelligence ops.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, how’d they like it?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: They all died.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey, guys? You recognize this man?

utterance.speaker: MAN
utterance.content: Matter of fact, I do.

utterance.speaker: MAN
utterance.content: He comes to the park 2 or 3 times a week. Looks for games.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What do you know about him?

utterance.speaker: MAN
utterance.content: He’s a crazy chess player. Makes some weird moves, like sacrificing his queen just to see what happens. He always wins, though.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Do you know his name?

utterance.speaker: MAN
utterance.content: Scott, or something like that. But if you want to know about this guy, you should talk to Yanni.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yanni? Who’s Yanni?

utterance.speaker: MAN
utterance.content: Another player. Him and your guy? Been spending a lot of time together lately.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So Blakely had over $2 million dollars in 6 accounts and none of them under his real name. Deposits were made by nonprofits, aid groups, environmental organizations.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So if those were his secret consulting accounts, it’s possible that one of those payments was for operation Pandora.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Exactly. These 2. Deposits of half a million dollars each. This one was from three months ago and this one was from a week ago.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: His start and finish payments.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mmhmm. Both from offshore accounts. But they’re closed. It’s a dead end.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yo! We may have a lead on Blakely. A guy in the park said he’s been spending time with this man. Yanacek Spivey. Two time national chess champion, now an economics professor at the School of International Affairs.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: An economics professor.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You think it’s related?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well, I don’t know if this helps, but the guy is also an advisor to the IMF, the UN Economics Council, and the Congressional Finance Committee.

utterance.speaker: YANNI
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s him. But he said his name was McGreggor. Not Blakely.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What do you know about him?

utterance.speaker: YANNI
utterance.content: Um, he was a hell of a chess player. It seemed like he knew every move I was going to make before I made it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, I mean personally.

utterance.speaker: YANNI
utterance.content: He really never talked about his personal life.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Witnesses said you spent a lot of time talking. What about?

utterance.speaker: YANNI
utterance.content: Economic theory. When he found out what I did, he had a million questions.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What kind of questions?

utterance.speaker: YANNI
utterance.content: About world economic forces. Historic socio-economic models. There were times where it seemed like he knew more than I did. He was quite the hobbyist.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, he was more than just a hobbyist. Did he focus on anything in specific?

utterance.speaker: YANNI
utterance.content: Ah, not that I remember. Though he was very concerned with the US economy.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: And he never mentioned any family or friends?

utterance.speaker: YANNI
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Anywhere he might have shopped. Anything that might indicate where he lived?

utterance.speaker: YANNI
utterance.content: No. But I – I think he lived in Union Square.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What makes you say that?

utterance.speaker: YANNI
utterance.content: After one of our walks, um, I discovered I left my chess set in the park and on my way back I saw him head into a building there.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you think you can identify that building for us?

utterance.speaker: YANNI
utterance.content: I think so.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I gotta borrow your car.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yep.

utterance.speaker: SUPER
utterance.content: Uh yeah, this is his place right here. But he said his name was Finley, not Blakely or McGreggor.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What’re we looking for?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Papers, computers, phone records, bills. Anything that’ll help up figure out what he was up to.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Beckett? Think I found it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What the hell?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Tax riots?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: European economic collapse.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Iran invades Iraq.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Syria moves on Israel.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: US commits troops to Taiwan.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: US commits troops to Middle East. Russia moves on Eastern Europe.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What kind of outcome was this linchpin supposed to create?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The end of our country as we know it. The third World War.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: This can’t be real. No one can predict all of this.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe not. But a bunch of people smarter than us think he can. He was killed to cover it up.

utterance.speaker: BLAKELY
utterance.content: I found an alarming vulnerability –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Over here.

utterance.speaker: BLAKELY
utterance.content: A linchpin that was tied to the economy that would cause crisis and devastation beyond anything we’d ever seen. The dominoes would just never stop falling.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who is she?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t know. But this is it. She’s the linchpin. The first domino to fall that leads … to war.

utterance.speaker: BLAKELY
utterance.content: I gave them the blueprint that will bring about the end of our country as we know it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I have to call. They have to know.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Put the phone down.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Gage?

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Put the phone down now.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Now run.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Run.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I thought you were the bad guy.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: If I were the bad guy you would be dead by now.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: This way.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, my car is out front.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: They’re watching your car. You go that way and you’ll die.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Who’s out there? Who are they?

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: You can have answers or you can live. Your choice.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Stay down!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We need to call our CIA contact. We need to tell them what’s going on.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: No calls.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where are we?

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Someplace safe. But we don’t have much time, all right? I’ve been on the grid, I’ve heard the chatter. Whatever this is, it’s going down tomorrow. Now, you got to Blakely’s before me. Who’s the target?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Why did you kill Blakely and McGrath?

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: I didn’t.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: C’mon. You really want me to take that gun away from you again? We don’t have the time!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Make time.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Look, as an asset you have to develop certain survival skills, all right? Chief of which is the ability to know something’s wrong without knowing why. It’s always something small. A static pop on your safe house phone. A slight delay on authorization using your credit cards. Or the almost imperceptible pauses in conversations with your handler. Something’s wrong. And if you don’t figure out what, you’re not going to survive the week. Now, someone’s trying to send this world spiraling towards war and they want me to take the fall. But neither of those things are going to happen. Now I need you to tell me what the name of the target is.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Look, let me call my CIA contact. She can help us.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: No. Everything indicates that Pandora’s being funded by military industrial concerns linked with Eastern Europe. They can’t pull off this operation. Not without help from the inside.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Detective. Don’t you get it? My own people are setting me up. And they’re not going to stop until I’m dead. Because I’m the diversion. Look, if everyone’s trying to stop me, then no one’s –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No one’s trying to stop Pandora.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: No one but me.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Now I’m going to ask you one last time. Who’s the target?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Hello Thomas.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: It’s the oldest intelligence con job in the book. Create a crisis so you can ride in just in time to save the day.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Gage was playing you. He wanted you to think he was the good guy. He needed your trust.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, but then why did he ask us who the linchpin was? Shouldn’t he have known?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: He was protecting his op. He was ascertaining how much we knew before he killed you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well if you’re right and the attack on us was staged, he can’t be working alone. Gage must have a partner.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Which means it’s not over.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: I want you to run this through every facial rec database we have. I want to know who she is and I want to know how the hell a 10 year old girl be the first domino in the march toward war.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Where’s Gage?

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: In the tank.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You know that guy you threw out the window, Gary Harper? He was a friend.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Then you shouldn’t have sent him for me.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You know, we’ve met before. In Berlin. Mannheim business? You were there at the drop off with a Spaniard. You were good. So who are you working for now?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Who’s the girl? Who’s the linchpin?

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: Who put me in the cold? Who set me up?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: So you think there’s someone in the CIA? A mole, a traitor. Is that what you think?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You know, I think you could be right. And I think it’s you.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: You’re making a mistake.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: No, you and your partner are making a mistake.

utterance.speaker: GAGE
utterance.content: I don’t have a partner. That guy out there, the guy that killed McGrath and Blakely and drove your friends into the water, the one carrying out operation Pandora? He’s not with me. I saw him at the docks. The way he moved. He’s with you. He’s CIA.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Are you sure he’s lying? He’s not expressing any of the physiological traits.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: He’s trying to lie without betraying himself. He wants to divide us, make us suspicious of each other. Trust me, there’s no mole but him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What if you’re wrong? What if he’s telling the truth?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: That is immaterial. Right now there is someone else out there who is preparing to go through with Pandora and that girl is the key. We need to find her.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: She’s a foreign national. She might not be in any of ours.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What about her school uniform? Can you identify her through that?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you really buy this? That killing a little girl could lead to the collapse of the United States? I mean, it just seems crazy.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Yeah well, so did Blakely’s first linchpin. They asked him to develop a nonnuclear military strategy that would bring down the Soviet Union. Turns out all we had to do was outspend them.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: We need to take another run at Gage. Looks like he’s all we’ve got.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Put us on lockdown. No one leaves or enters the facility.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Contact burns. He was shot point blank.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How is it that nobody heard the shot?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: The room is soundproof. The real question is, how come nobody saw?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How is that possible? You’re the CIA. You have the most secure computers in the world.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Possible because Gage was right. There’s a mole in the CIA and he’s in this unit.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: Facility’s locked down. All personnel have been accounted for.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How many people had access to that room?

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: Then there’s no way to tell where it came from.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: You can do that?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Do it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Wow. I got no idea what they’re talking about but this is very exciting.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Whose is it?

utterance.speaker: AGENT TRAN
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Then who is it?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Run a personnel match.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Martin.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: Oh, Soph. I’m loyal. You know I’m loyal.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Then put the gun down.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Put it down!

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: Okay. Right. Okay.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: You shoot, she dies! Everyone back up now!

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Don’t, don’t do it!

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: Back up now! Hand!

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Martin, don’t. Martin! Martin, don’t. Put the gun down, Martin.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: Thanks, but I’d rather live.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Shut the elevator down!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: There’s no way you could have known.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: No? When we first got wind of Pandora, Danberg was the one that found all the connections. He was the one who traced it to Gage. All so we wouldn’t get to close to him. Even tried to convince me to get rid of you two. And worst of all, he may not be working alone.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The implications of Pandora are huge. I don’t understand how one of our own could actually want to plunge the country or the world into war.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Money. Ideology. None of it makes any sense.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well the motives don’t matter. All that matters is stopping Pandora. Gage said he picked up chatter. Said it’s going down tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: We’ve heard the same thing, which means we don’t have any time. We have to find her.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, there has to be something that we missed. Some detail that will help us figure out who she is.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: We’ve run it through every database we have. We’ve looked through everything.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No everything. You guys maintain a topographical survey of the Earth, right?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Yeah, why?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So don’t search for the girl. Run the mountains. If we know where she’s from we can narrow down our search.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You are a genius.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How long will this take?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: It’s a big world. We’ve pulled anything arid and everything above and below 60 degrees latitude, but they’re estimating it could take 32 hours.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Sounds like a long night. I’ll get some coffees.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: He was always thoughtful.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You like him.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: I did. Once.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So what happened, if you don’t mind my asking?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Well, um… you ever meet someone and – and have that intense attraction right away? You know, that tension? Well, we fought it for months and then - and then we just couldn’t stand it anymore.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: But afterward it was like that tension was all we had, really, and without it all we were left with was that – well, all those things that drove us crazy about each other.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: I mean, you know how he can be.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, I do.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Sometimes I wish we had never slept together. Had kept that longing.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Even your coffee mugs say CIA. That is so cool.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Well, if we save the world maybe I’ll let you keep one.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ah. Incentive.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s near Shanghai.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Pull up all school uniform insignias from that region.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wait, right there in the top right corner. They’re the same color.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Shanghai #12 Girls School. Do they have a website?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Hack into the photo archives and run facial rec. Bring up the captions and compare.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: What do we know about her?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Xiang Ganghong?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Who’s Xiang Ganghong?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: He’s a Chinese businessman with close ties to the finance minister and members of the ruling party.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, why is his daughter targeted?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Xiang is a kingmaker. He’s extremely influential in shaping his government’s economic policy. He made his fortune selling Chinese military hardware, sometimes to our enemies, but we left him alone because he was supportive of China’s purchase of US debt. Now, if someone were to take out Xiang, not that much would change. But if his daughter were killed in a botched assassination attempt and the Chinese were able to trace it back to the US government –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: A trail that led to Gage.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: It’s conceivable that Xiang could use his considerable influence to singlehandedly end China’s purchase of US debt.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: This country runs on deficit spending. If – if we couldn’t borrow money –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We couldn’t meet our obligations, the government would shut down.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Austerity measures would be imposed. We’d lose our ability to deploy our military around the world.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And then, with the US neutralized, our enemies would be able to explore their interests unchecked.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: That’s right. And there would be an explosion of regional conflicts, any one of which could send us toward global war.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: A war that we might not even be able to win.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: One domino knocked down - the entire world changes.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: He’s here?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: If we call it in I can get a protective detail waiting.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You think your cops are going to be able to stop CIA trained operatives? They’ll just end up dead. Besides, if word of this gets out it could spark an international incident of epic proportions. We need to clean up the mess, not make one.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We and what army? You said we couldn’t trust the others because they might be working with Danberg.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: This is not the only CIA station in New York. I’ve got another field team on the way. You seal it up until you hear from me. No calls going in or out. We’re not taking any chances.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Agent Corrigan, Detective Beckett, Mr. Castle. Where’s the delegation?

utterance.speaker: AGENT CORRIGAN
utterance.content: 5 minutes away?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: We in position?

utterance.speaker: CORRIGAN
utterance.content: We have teams in the lobby and spotters across the street.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What about Danberg?

utterance.speaker: CORRIGAN
utterance.content: The guard ID’ed him as having entered the building 45 minutes ago. We have crews in place authorized to take him out but we still haven’t identified his partner.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Whatever happens, keep the girl alive. You understand me?

utterance.speaker: CORRIGAN
utterance.content: Yes ma’am.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where are we going?

utterance.speaker: CORRIGAN
utterance.content: This way.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What are we doing down here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Shouldn’t we be headed for the lobby?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle!

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Sorry.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Danberg wasn’t the mole, was he? You are.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Go kill the girl. I’ll take care of these two.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It was you this whole time?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: I’m afraid so.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Then why bring us here? Why not just leave us at the facility?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Because you just don’t stop. You need to know the story, the whole story. If something doesn’t add up you just don’t let go. Why do you think I brought you inside? I was protecting the op.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Like you were trying to protect the operation when you killed Blakely and McGrath?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You set up Gage.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: For the linchpin to work, the Chinese have to blame the US government. The operation has to trace back to the CIA.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And when you needed to cover your tracks, you killed them. So then you needed someone else. You needed Danberg. Sophia. World War III? Why?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Let’s just say there are certain parties who will pay anything to reshape the world.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t buy it. The Sophia I know wouldn’t sell out her country. Not for money, not for anything.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Well, that’s one thing you got wrong, Rick. This was never my country. On your knees. Right now. Both of you!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re never going to get away with this.

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: Of course I will. I’ll just tell them how we all tried to stop it and couldn’t, and the two of you were killed in the process, by Danberg, of course. Don’t worry. I’ll make it sound heroic. Your father would be very proud.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: My father?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You don’t think you gained special access to the CIA back then because of your charm?

utterance.speaker: SOPHIA
utterance.content: You really don’t know, do you? I guess you never will.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wha –

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: C’mon! It’s just us and we’re out of time.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Are you okay? He’s fine!

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: He’s good. He’s okay.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, maybe we should go outside.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So what do you think this was all about?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: They didn’t tell you?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What? Did –

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Huh.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: They told you?

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: Once she turned me out it didn’t take long to put the pieces together, but all I could do was watch and wait for her to make her move.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hard to believe she was a traitor, that it was all an act.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: Langley thinks she may have been a former KGB sleeper, set adrift when the Soviet Union broke up. Stayed with the company because she had nowhere else to go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: ‘Til a better offer came along.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did you ever find out who she was working for? Who was behind Pandora?

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: No, and even if I did, I couldn’t tell you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Agent Danberg … Sophia said something, something about my father being in the CIA. Would you know anything about that?

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: I’m afraid I don’t. Sorry.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: Oh, Detective Beckett. Here. I had our guys take care of your car.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You pulled my car out of the river?

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: Yep. I think you’ll find it better than new.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: DANBERG
utterance.content: It’s the least that we could do. Take care.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You think she was telling the truth? About my father? I mean, that would explain why he completely disappeared.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I - I think that Sophia told a lot of lies. Must be tough. Finding out that she’s a traitor, especially after you based Clara Strike on her and all.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hmm… well, Clara started off as Sophia, but she ended up being more like you. You know, smart, fierce, kind. I think that was one of the reasons I was drawn to you. As a muse. You think Dr. Blakely was right? About the linchpin? Do you think we actually saved the world?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I think that we saved a little girl’s life. And that’s enough for me.

utterance.speaker: THE END
utterance.content: CASTLE
